players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find Charlie's sudden death suspicious. Let's keep a close eye on each other during this game."
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and found out she's the mafioso. We should vote for her to protect the town."
You: "I agree with Diana that we need to be vigilant in this game. Let's focus on finding the truth and working together as a team."
You: "I believe we should all focus on gathering more information and working together to uncover the truth. Let's try to keep an open mind and not jump to conclusions based on assumptions alone."

Diana: "Based on the information we have so far, it seems that one of us is the mafioso. Let's continue to work together and gather more evidence before making any decisions. We don't want to make a hasty vote that could potentially harm an innocent..."

players.name: Bob

Diana: "Based on the information we have so far, it seems that one of us is the mafioso. Let's continue to work together and gather more evidence before making any decisions. We don't want to make a hasty vote that could potentially harm an innocent..."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
